channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NY

item.title: Report X-2024010119
item.description:
Report X-2024010119

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-11T15:12:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-03
  • City: BRONX
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO (4) STYROFOAM PACKAGES THAT WERE COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY FIVE POUNDS OF DRY ICE COOLING FOOD IN EACH PACKAGE. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOXES. PERISHABLE ORANGE STICKERS HAVE BEEN APPLIED TO EACH PACKAGE. ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBERS TO OTHER CONSIGNEES IN THE USA ARE 1Z6T83T51392841153, 1Z6T83T50191712969 AND 1Z6T83T51391157136. THESE PACKAGES HAVE NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: The caps on one of the bottles were loose and during transportation one of the inner gallon bottles leaked out on the package. DescribePack: The cap on the bottle was not tightly closed. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Following directional arrows
